definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: China’s demands to Uralkali included a promise to use its “utmost efforts” to continue supplying the import-dependent Chinese market with potash, or potassium chloride.
sentences.chinese: 中國的碳酸鉀和氯化鉀一直依賴進口。

sentences.english: Objective: The optimized formulation of potassium chloride(KCl) sustained release tablets(SR) was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氯化鉀緩釋片的優化工藝。

sentences.english: At the same time, at the request of Liu Yunxiang, Carle gave him a bottle of potassium chloride.
sentences.chinese: 同時在劉雲翔的要求下，卡爾給了他一瓶氯化鉀。
